title: A copy of verses, presented to all my loving masters and mistrisses, in the town of Lambeth. By Thomas Ouldman, bel-man for that part of the parish.
author: Ouldman, Thomas.
publisher: printed by H. Brugis in Green Arbor Little old Bayly,
notes: Verse - "My masters all, these lines I do present".
A collection of short verses on various themes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
